work.name: NVIDIA Maxine AI
work.summary: Developed end-to-end deep learning models for controllable portrait video animation as part of NVIDIA Maxine.

work.name: NVIDIA Maxine AI
work.summary: Developed end-to-end visual and audio-visual deep learning models for high-fidelity facial animation of avatars as part of Maxine ARSDK.

work.name: IBM Research India
summary: Developed an end-to-end soil moisture extraction system from satellite images by incorporating image interpolation techniques as a part of IBM Geospatial Analytics suite.
Developed explainable deep learning models in the domains of image classification and visual search as a part of retail and operations effort

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
